Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Nitrofurantoin
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System for use with Nitrofurantoin 4 - 128 μg/mL - Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with Nitrofurantoin addition for rapid AST of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and most Gram-positive bacteria isolates (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) from pure culture using Nitrofurantoin in Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only BD Phoenix panels
